trans-unit.source: Defines a contract that components can use to access information about a method across application domain and process boundaries.
trans-unit.target: 定义一个协定，组件可使用该协定跨应用程序域和进程边界访问有关方法的信息。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract> represents a method of a remote object that implements the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract>表示远程对象实现的方法<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract>接口。

trans-unit.source: To access one or more methods of a remote object, use the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract.GetRemoteType%2A> method to get an <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract> that represents the type of the remote object.
trans-unit.target: 若要访问的远程对象的一个或多个方法，使用<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract.GetRemoteType%2A>方法以获取<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract>表示远程对象的类型。

trans-unit.source: Returns information about the method that this <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract" /> identifies.
trans-unit.target: 返回有关此 <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract" /> 标识的方法的信息。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteMethodData" /> that provides information about the method that this <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract" /> identifies.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteMethodData" />，提供有关此 <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract" /> 标识的方法的信息。

trans-unit.source: The information provided by the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteMethodData> structure includes the types of the method's return value and parameters.
trans-unit.target: 提供的信息<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteMethodData>结构包含的方法的返回值和参数的类型。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract" /> that identifies the object that contains the method to invoke.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract" />，标识包含要调用的方法的对象。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> values that specifies how to invoke the method.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 值的一个按位组合，用于指定调用方法的方式。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentArrayContract" /> that specifies the method parameters; <see langword="null" /> if the method does not have any parameters.
trans-unit.target: 一个指定方法参数的 <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentArrayContract" />；如果方法不具有任何参数，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The locale ID that the method will use for any locale-specific type conversions of the arguments or return value.
trans-unit.target: 方法在参数或返回值的任何区域设置特定的类型转换中将使用的区域设置 ID。

trans-unit.source: Invokes the method that this <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract" /> identifies.
trans-unit.target: 调用此 <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract" /> 标识的方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" /> that specifies the return value of the invoked method.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" />，指定已调用方法的返回值。

trans-unit.source: If the invoked method does not have a return value (for example, the method is a constructor), <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A> returns a default <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument> in which the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument.RemoteArgumentKind%2A> property is set to the value <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgumentKind.Missing?displayProperty=nameWithType> and the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument.TypeCode%2A> property is set to the value <xref:System.TypeCode.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用的方法没有返回值 （例如，方法是一个构造函数），<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A>返回的默认<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument>顺序<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument.RemoteArgumentKind%2A>属性设置为值<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgumentKind.Missing?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument.TypeCode%2A>属性设置为值<xref:System.TypeCode.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
